doc: is a simple material in terms of rendering that relies on a 2d spherical environment map to render transparent, glass like material.

properties.name: factors
properties.doc: Specifies a factor to be applied to the normal.

properties.name: disturbation
properties.doc: Specifies a disturbance factor that will be added to the normal

properties.name: postVertexColor
properties.doc: Specifies the factor which controls how much of the per vertex color we want to transmit.

properties.name: postGain
properties.doc: Specifies the factor to be applied to the vertex color.

properties.name: semGain
properties.doc: Specifies the gain factor to be applied to the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: sem
properties.doc: Specifies the spherical environment map to use. It is expected to be in sRGB color space.

properties.name: semInnerFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the inner color filter to be applied based on fresnel on the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: semOuterFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the outer color filter to be applied based on fresnel on the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: semInnerAlpha
properties.doc: Specifies the inner alpha filter to be applied based on fresnel on the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: semOuterAlpha
properties.doc: Specifies the outer alpha filter to be applied based on fresnel on the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: glassInnerFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the glass inner color filter to be applied based on fresnel.

properties.name: glassOuterFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the glass outer color filter to be applied based on fresnel.
